Articles.Content:
I have finally landed my first ever rover on a celestial body. The MUN! My methods for landing this rover are not your standard methods. The rover was sitting on a platform, which would decouple from my now wasted lander (see in background) and would be slightly pushed up into the air. I slowly maneuvered it and the platform would explode, leaving the rover itself harmless, and all alone. This rover is unmanned, because boy i would feel bad for anybody who has to drive this hunk o' junk. But this rover will make history, history i tell you!

Next mission, more powerful rover technology and cooler looking rovers!
you have a nice looking rover you have there
Why do you have a parachute on a rover going to the Mun?
You have a ... *cough ... parachute on that rover.

Why do you have a parachute on a rover going to the Mun?

Uhm i thought i could use it.... and that didn't work very well. But it looks nice.
